name: 陳建丞
objective:
本課程為適性揚才的職涯訓練課程，旨在於幫助學生探索自我、認識職場、學習軟硬實力並打開求職視野。課程將分為職涯探索、職場技能、企業職能及求職技能等四大類主題，邀請業師到班授課，並且連結實習機會，厚植學生求職信心。
This course is an adaptive career training course designed to help students explore their potential, understand the workplace, learn soft and hard skills, and extend career opportunities. The courses will be divided into four major themes: career exploration, workplace skills, industry introduction, resume writing and interview skills. Lecturers from different profession will be invited to share their domain knowledge in the class, and internship opportunities will be linked to encourage student to start career planning
